name: Arrow's Dark Theme
description: A Dark theme created for TeamSoC.net.
additional_info:
Version 2.1.1
-Made blue a little darker

-Version 2.1
-Made more things blue

-Real Version 2.0
-Fixed a couple of things in the ACP
-Fixed text in drop down menus being hard to read


- Fake Version 2.0
-Made everything 100% better

-Version 1.9
-Fixed spoiler text not showing up
-Fixed quotes inside of spoilers not working properly. 


-Version 1.8
-Fixed [hr] tags not showing a line break
-Fixed topic icons not being used
-Changed hover color to yellow.

Version 1.7
-Updated some elements to be clearer and have hover options
-Fixed all known chrome capability issues

Version 1.6
-Restored highlight functionality to certain admin pages

Version 1.5
-Fixed font color options not displaying properly during creating a new post/editing. 

Version 1.4
-Changed a few elements to make them darker
-Fixed a few of the chrome problems. 


Version 1.3
-Added new blue icons

Version 1.2


To do:

-Might Modify more icons.

----Credits----

Based on the Prosilver dark by discon theme found at http://userstyles.org/styles/79101/prosilver-dark
It also used the imageset found at http://www.christianbullock.com/2013/dark-prosilver-imageset-released
